scenes.background: You acknowledged Monica's urgency. [Bob] listens quietly.
scenes.description: [Bob] says, 'If we're deciding quickly, should I take a lead on the report?'

options.text: That sounds good, Bob. I'll assist you if needed.
options.analysis: You show good self-regulation and social skills by supporting Bob's initiative, but motivation and emotional perception could be higher.

options.text: Sure, Bob. Just let me know what you need from me.
options.analysis: You demonstrate high empathy and emotional perception by offering support, but your social skills could be better by being more proactive.

options.text: Actually, I think it's better if we all focus on our strengths. I can handle the report.
options.analysis: You show strong motivation and social skills by taking responsibility, but empathy and emotional perception could be improved.
